id: Task Flow - Task Management Notion Template
name: Task Flow - Task Management Notion Template
description: Transform Your Task Management with Task Flow: The All-In-One SolutionAre you struggling to keep track of all your tasks and projects, feeling overwhelmed, often missing deadlines, and never achieving your goals? Do you find it hard to prioritize your goals and stay on track?Introducing Task Flow - the ultimate task management Notion template that will help you take control of your to-do list, prioritize your goals, and stay on track with your projects in different areas of your life. With Task
features: Quick capture:to easily capture tasks; Inbox view:tasks without a due date; Timeline view:a monthly timeline of all your uncompleted tasks; Today's view:a view that shows all the tasks for today; Upcoming view:a view that shows all the tasks within a week; Projects database:a database where you’ve all your projects; Goals database:a database where you’ve all your goals; Areas database:a database for different areas of your life; All tasks page:a page where you’ll find all the tasks; Tasks archive:a page where are all your completed tasks
